bug.author: Yancey1989
bug.description: Sending build context to Docker daemon 7.392MB Step 1/6 : FROM tatsushid/tinycore-python:2.7 ---> da605b5a5fc5 Step 2/6 : RUN pip install visualdl ---> Using cache ---> e3501944165c Step 3/6 : WORKDIR / ---> Using cache ---> 23abec58902e Step 4/6 : COPY ./demo/vdl_scratch.py vdl_scratch.py lstat demo/vdl_scratch.py: no such file or directory
